sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-table
            :data="tableData"
            style="width: 100%"
            size="small ">
        <el-table-column
                type="index"
                width="50">
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
                prop="date"
                label="日期"
                sortable
                width="180">
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
                prop="name"
                label="姓名"
                width="180">
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
                prop="name"
                label="学号"
                width="180">
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
                prop="name"
                label="专业"
                width="180">
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
                prop="name"
                label="班级"
                width="180">
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
                prop="tag"
                label="标签"
                width="100"
                :filters="[{ text: '已上传', value: '已上传' }, { text: '未上传', value: '未上传' }]"
                :filter-method="filterTag"
                filter-placement="bottom-end">
            <template slot-scope="scope">
                <el-tag
                        :type="scope.row.tag === '未上传' ? 'warning' : 'success'"
                        close-transition>{{scope.row.tag}}</el-tag>
            </template>
        </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "Index",
        data() {
            return {
                tableData: [{
                    date: '2016-05-02',
                    name: '王小虎',
                    stuid: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄',
                    cls: '计算机科学与技术1班',
                    major: '计算机科学与技术',
                    tag: '已上传'
                }, {
                    date: '2016-05-04',
                    name: '王小虎',
                    stuid: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄',
                    tag: '未上传'
                }, {
                    date: '2016-05-01',
                    name: '王小虎',
                    stuid: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1519 弄',
                    tag: '家'
                },  {
                    date: '2013333-05-01',
                    name: '王小虎',
                    stuid: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1519 弄',
                    tag: '已上传'
                },
                    {
                    date: '2016-05-03',
                    name: '王小虎',
                    stuid: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1516 弄',
                    tag: '公司'
                }]
            }
        },
        methods: {
            formatter(row, column) {
                return row.address;
            },
            filterTag(value, row) {
                return row.tag === value;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
